General.Name: Jiangsu Hoperun Software Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Hoperun Software Co., Ltd. provides financial technology and the Internet of Things solutions in China, Japan, Southeast Asia, North America, and internationally. The company offers chips, hardware, software, and application platforms. It provides financial software solutions for IT, banking, insurance, and testing sectors; and Internet of Things solutions, including smart home and retail, smart IoT, and cloud computing. Jiangsu Hoperun Software Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Nanjing, China.
